chat.msg: Good morning, my name is Sean. What can I help you with today?

Hello Sean, I am very confident there is a bug in your software. It has been making our systems crash and I’m not sure how to fix it. I’m very frustrated because it has taken 3 hours for someone from Support to respond.
What have you tried to fix the issue? We have been busy with other customers which is why it took so long

We tried everything that your company suggested on the help page. I'm afraid that none of them even came close to solving the issue. It makes me anxious to hear that other customers take priority over us.

I’m sorry to hear that the help page did not assist you. I am sure that I’ll be able to help you resolve this. All our customers are of the utmost importance to us, and I am sorry for making you wait so long. Can I ask you to run the following command and provide the output: “./db2ilist | grep db2inst1"
I'm glad someone is finally taking an interest in helping us. The command provided this output: “db2inst1”. Does this mean our instance is created?
Yes it does. This is puzzling, since the software seems to think that it is not created.
